replies.body:
BL staff think their GCheat is perfect and it Isn't unfortunately... 

That's more of the issue than anything tbh, GCheat falsely bans lots of people as well, even if it is very good. 

Plaz, Pedro, DGB, Stan, Trail are all legit. I've faced so many people with autoclicker that I know if someone has autoclicker or not almost 100% of the time. I've fought Pedro, he doesn't autoclick, I've fought DGB, no autoclick, fought Stan, no autoclick, I've seen others vs Trail and his PoV, he looks legit. I've seen Plaz fight people and his PoV and he's legit.

But when you spectate any of them, it's a lot harder to tell tbh. 

GCheat isn't perfect, nor are the BL staff, so...yea...false bans occur, like it or not. 

Note: PlaZa getting banned off Kohi falsely:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Juvra43AKI 

Banned for FF, and he obv wasn't using anything. 
But that totally looked sketch, right? (Sarcasm Alert)

replies.body: Not to fanboy or anything, but GCheat did help with the accuracy of bans, so their ban accuracy must have been lower before GCheat came out and it's more difficult to tell if someone's autoclicking or using a Ghost Client when specing. Unless it's something that stands out a lot ofc.

replies.body: FYI Stan admitted to hacking before judgement day, that's why he was banned. As for Pedro he's the kind of person who magically learns to bleeple or breezily bridge over night and PlaZa has claimed to be using DGBs client, wether being serious or not, he's dodgy as fuck anyway. Never talked to Trial so I don't really care or know about him. And I fully believe in GCheat, as hack developer have no way to bypass the plugin it is extremely accurate, plus they've used many hacked clients to make sure that it detects them.

replies.body:
I never said Pedro was a legit Breezily Bridger, I said PvPer. And PlaZa was joking around...  
and I don't see how that vid looks sketch in any way... 

Apparently you know nothing about Ghost Clients either... (Hack Developer Skillz)
GCheat is also NOT 100% accurate. That's a fact. 
Dualzz used triggerbot for a short while and didn't get caught by GCheat, so It Is bypassable. He admitted to it and got banned, no GCheat detection.

And have you even fought any of these people? GCheat has falsely banned ItsTene a few times, after he's proven many times that he doesn't macro. 

So don't say it isn't bypassable and 100% accurate, because that's bull.

So many PvPers have gone on BL and autoclicked/triggerbotted that weren't detected by GCheat and staff had to spec to make the bans. So don't act like GCheat is always right or always knows/detects. 

Pedro is also the second person to learn how to Breezily bridge.
replies.body_tagged:
I never said Pedro was a legit Breezily Bridger, I said PvPer. And PlaZa was joking around...

GCheat is also NOT 100% accurate. That's a fact.

And have you even fought any of these people? GCheat has falsely banned ItsTene a few times, after he's proven many times that he doesn't macro. 

So don't say it isn't bypassable and 100% accurate, because that's bull.

So many PvPers have gone on BL and autoclicked/triggerbotted that weren't detected by GCheat and staff had to spec to make the bans. So don't act like GCheat is always right or always knows/detects. 

Pedro is also the second person to learn how to Breezily bridge.
